name: gamine
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to describe a girl or young woman who is thin, has short hair, and is attractively like a young boy in appearance: Her newly cropped hair gives her a fashionably gamine look.
a girl or young woman who is thin, has short hair, and is attractively like a boy in appearance: a sweet-hearted gamine from the provinces
More examplesFewer examplesShe effortlessly takes on personae, from modern gamine to retro siren to pale and haunting vamp.Both were a new kind of screen idol: the tarnished heartthrob and the playful gamine.They were both about 19 years old, she a moon-faced gamine with large eyes, he a lean-faced youngster who couldn't stop talking. Audrey Tautou is the French gamine who plays the title role in Amelie.
